channel.title: Top-Down on Junlog
channel.description: Recent content in Top-Down on Junlog

item.title: 3. Syntax analysis(1)
item.description: Context-free grammar CFG : defined with a set of production rules ex) E -> E + E E -> E * E E -> id E -> num Derivation ex) E ⇒ E + E ⇒ id + E ⇒ id + num we will use ⇒* to denote arbitrary number of rewriting steps Terminal Symbol vs Non-Terminal Symbol Terminal Symbol : can’t be rewritten anymore (+, *, id, num) Non-Terminal Symbol : can be rewritten (E)
